This application was generated by Celerio, an Open Source tool developed by Jaxio, a company based in Paris, France.

Code Generation Templates used to generate this application are Open Source:

  • javaee-lab: https://github.com/jaxio/javaee-lab

Need commercial support ? please contact us...
Please login first in order to access the application content.
Start a new creation or search
Here is the list of generated pages:

You can fine tune the code generation using Celerio configuration file which can be found in the folder "src/main/config/celerio-maven-plugin". This file allows you to:

  • Configure bidirectional relations (ie one to many)
  • Configure JPA inheritance
  • Rename your entities or properties
  • Configure packages to group your entities by functional domain
  • Configure number mappings or date mappings
  • etc.
